fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At night, choose a player to form an opinion about, choosing either negative/positive. Players will be informed that they were thought of by someone (the role is not specified), but not which opinion they received. If you form a new opinion about a player, the old one is replaced.
- At night, choose to attack everyone you have a negative opinion of.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Players you have a positive opinion of will find you innocent and their votes will not count against you. (However, this can only negate up to 3 votes.)
- You cannot form opinions on Peasants.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Have each living Peasant fulfill their Destiny.
